name: Feminism Unpacked
description:
✰ friendly, no-stakes, not-preachy, easy to understand guide to feminism made with over 70 different sources, all of which are linked for you to explore further.

✰ takes about 15 minutes to play and is absolutely free.

✰ explains stuff like intersectionality and how feminism looks a little different for everyone, and why.

✰ goes through some of the major misconceptions about feminism, and links you to the people who actually know what they are talking about. 

✰ gives you instructions on how to get involved in feminism, if you want to.

✰ contains a resource section with introductions into different topics within feminism, such as  economic inequality (pay gap, workplace harrasment, etc. ), care work, rape culture, and reproductive justice, with links to the best and most knowledgable organizations I could find. 

✰ I give you a gold star if you complete my feedback form, and I also might add your advice to the game.
